description.msg001:
feat: development of a new feature
fix: correction of errors generating bugs
docs: changes in project documentation
style: changes in code formatting and style that do not impact the system
refactor: code refactoring without impact on system logic/business rules
perf: changes to improve application performance
chore: changes that do not affect the system, but are related to development
test: creation or alteration of test codes
build: changes that affect the build process or external dependencies
ci: changes in CI configuration files
revert: reversal of a previous commit/check-in.
